task.title: Omelet
task.shortdesc: You can't go wrong with this classic breakfast choice that can be reproduced in a variety of ways.

taskbody.context: w to cook using a pan on the stove. The most complicated step will be flipping the omelet, but do not discouraged. With lots of practice, you will become a pro at flipping at omelets. Feel free to add any additional vegetables or meat your heart desires, you really can't go wrong with what you add inside an omelet.
